1.text: Position the mango vertically on a cutting board.

2.text: Use a very sharp knife to make a shallow cut under the skin of the mango from its top.

3.text: Slice off a thin strip of mango skin, cutting away from your body.

4.text: Repeat the process until you have stripped the mango of its skin.

5.text: Put the mango on a cutting board.

6.text: Use the vegetable peeler to remove slices of mango skin until the skin is almost gone.

7.text: Use a knife to cut off the top and bottom of the mango.

8.text: Pick a mango to peel that is already ripe.

9.text: Put the mango on a cutting board.

11.text: When you're peeling the mango, try to take off full chunks.

12.text: Rotate the mango and peel off another side.

13.text: Peel away any skin that remains on the mango.

14.text: You should now have a peeled mango.
